patches.content:
TEMPLATE = app
TARGET = tests
CONFIG += testcase
QT += testlib widgets svg

INCLUDEPATH += ../..

SOURCES += test_arrow.cpp \
           ../../arrow.cpp

HEADERS += ../../arrow.h \
            ../../diagramitem.h

DEFINES += QT_DISABLE_DEPRECATED_BEFORE=0

win32 {
    CONFIG += console
}

unix {
    CONFIG -= app_bundle
}
QMAKE_CXXFLAGS += --coverage
QMAKE_LFLAGS += --coverage
